name: Fill a student registration form using mandatory fields

children.description: Given the student is on landing page of Tools QA
When him browse to registration form

And him has filled it and submitted
| firstName | admin |
| lastName | admin123 |
| gender | Male |
| mobile | 1234567890 |
Then the student will see a registration information

userStory.narrative:
As an automation tester
    I need to practice automation testing using Screenplay patter
    for learn about serenity BDD framework

title: Fill a student registration form using mandatory fields

dataTable.scenarioOutline:

When him browse to registration form
And him has filled it and submitted
Then the student will see a registration information

scenarioOutline:
Given the student is on landing page of Tools QA
When him browse to registration form
And him has filled it and submitted
|firstName | <firstName>|
|lastName | <lastName>|
|gender | <gender>|
|mobile | <mobile>|
Then the student will see a registration information
